text: 30:8 Matyu 6:11; Luk 11:330:8-9 Nehemia 9:25-26; Jop 31:24; Hosea 13:6nɨ nan akuraghtɨ, kɨ akɨrim ragh ifavarir arazibagh asaragham. Eghtɨ nɨ na ateghtɨ, kɨ dagɨaba izɨvazir gumazimɨn mɨn otivan kogh, egh uaghan onganarazibagh amir gumazimɨn mɨn otivan kogham. Nɨ dughiar vamɨran vaghvagh daghebara na danɨng.
